select instance_id from (select instance_id, create_at, row_number() over (partition by instance_id order by create_at desc) rn from aipp_instance_log where create_by = #{createUserAccount} and aipp_id = #{aippId} and aipp_type = #{aippType}) t where t.rn = 1 order by t.create_at desc
mapper.select: SELECT instance_id FROM ( SELECT instance_id, create_at, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY instance_id ORDER BY create_at DESC ) rn FROM aipp_instance_log WHERE create_by = #{createUserAccount} AND aipp_id = #{aippId} AND aipp_type = #{aippType} AND log_id >= ( SELECT log_id FROM aipp_instance_log WHERE log_data ->> 'form_args' like '%\"fileContent\":%' AND aipp_id = #{aippId} AND create_by = #{createUserAccount} ORDER BY create_at DESC LIMIT 1 ) ) T WHERE T.rn = 1 ORDER BY T.create_at DESC

select
from aipp_instance_log
log_type = 'FORM'
and instance_id = #{instanceId}
order by create_at desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into aipp_instance_log (aipp_id, version, aipp_type, instance_id, log_data, log_type, create_by, path) values (#{aippId}, #{version}, #{aippType}, #{instanceId}, #{logData}::jsonb, #{logType}, #{createUserAccount}, #{path})
mapper.select:
select
from aipp_instance_log
log_type != 'HIDDEN_MSG'
AND
path LIKE '%/'||#{item}||'%'
mapper.delete: delete from aipp_instance_log where path Like '/'||#{instanceId}||'%'
